main event: A soldier reported observing an unidentified aerial object at Sandia Base, New Mexico on September 29, 1950.
interesting points: The object was observed at 0445 hours and was described as having a bluish-yellow flame., The shape was oblong with a cut-off rear, from which flame and sparks were emanating., The object's speed was estimated to be between 250-400 mph., The observation lasted approximately 3-4 seconds., The weather conditions were clear at the time of the sighting.
